body_text:
I rewrote the tests using tf.test.TestCase.
The tests depend on the .txt files and the filetree.
The PIP package shouldn't be needed here?
I have put together the changes to python_modules.txt in this comment.
body:
- I rewrote the tests using `tf.test.TestCase`.
- The tests depend on the `.txt` files and the filetree.
- The PIP package shouldn't be needed here?
- I have put together the changes to `python_modules.txt` in [this comment](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15368#issuecomment-351777543).
